revisions.rev:
{{Cleanup-spam|date=April 2010}} This is a '''list of [[digital library]] projects'''.
*''For [[bibliographic database]]s consisting primarily of [[magazine]]s, [[Academic journal|journals]] and other [[periodical]]s, see [[List of academic databases and search engines]].'' *''For individual [[Collection (museum)|online exhibitions]] from primarily physical collections, search Wikipedia for the name of the sponsoring [[organization|institution]].''

{| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 90%; width: 100%" |- ! Name ! Subject(s) ! Description ! Provider(s) |- |[[Ahlul Bayt Digital Islamic Library Project]] (Ahlul Bayt DILP) |[[Islam]] |Digitizes and presents resources related to history, law, and society of the Islamic religion and its personalities with particular emphasis on the Twelver Shi'ah Islamic school of thought. |[[Ahlul Bayt Digital Islamic Library Project]]<ref>[http://al-islam.org Al-Islam.org]</ref> |- |[[Aozora Bunko]] |[[Japanese language]] |Digitized [[Japanese language]] texts. |[[Aozora Bunko]]<ref>[http://www.aozora.gr.jp/ Aozora Bunko (in Japanese)]</ref> |- |[[Arnetminer]] |[[Computer science]] & [[Information science]] |A free online service used to index and search academic social networks, hosted at Department of Computer Science and Technology of Tsinghua University |[[Arnetminer]]<ref>[http://arnetminer.org Arnetminer.org]</ref> |- |[[Atoll Digital Library]] |General |Document publishing system that allows users to create their own digital library |[http://www.opale-concept.com/atoll-ui/index.php?language=2 Opale-concept] |- |[[Arts and Humanities Data Service]] |[[Arts]] & [[Humanities]] |Images, texts and datasets largely collected from UK universities.
